lead_paragraph: VAN GELDER--Lawrence, on March 11, 2016. Consummate newspaperman, coverer of culture for the New York Times and WQXR, professor of journalism at Columbia University, and mentor to countless writers. Much loved by daughters Sadie and Miranda, partner of 28 years Ursula Koch-Sotiropoulos, and her son, Andreas. Memorial service on April 2 at 2pm at Frank E. Campbell Funeral Home, NYC. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  VAN GELDER, LAWRENCE
